 Hi,

this isn't supported at present.

It was talked about at the Copenhagen workshop (see wiki
for details). I was hoping to start looking at this 
in the next week or so.

cheers 

mark 

-----Original Message-----
From: zhousp
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Sent: 6/15/04 9:25 AM
Subject: [archive-crawler] Does heritrix support recraw?

hello,developer,
 
Does heritrix support craw  a web which has been crawled before?
I means when a site has been crawled, then next time heritrix should
only 
fetch the newer document than the last time.
 
ansi zhou
